remarks: The property of being an undirected multigraph, expressing the edges as "words".  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2015.)
statement:
wrdumgra $p |- ( ( V e. W /\ E e. Word X ) -> ( V UMGrph E <-> E e. Word { x e. ( ~P V \ { (/) } ) | ( # ` x ) <_ 2 } ) ) $.
$d E x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
